hadith.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“I covered a small room closet of mine, meaning, from the inside, with a curtain on which there were images. When the Prophet (ﷺ) came, he tore it down, so I made two pillows from it, and I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) reclining on one of them.”

grades.name: Zubair Ali Zai
grades.grade: Sahih - Isnaad Hasan Bukhari And Muslim
